timeline.message: Add logging for form cache errors
Add logging for failure to load instance

timeline.bodyText: Do we need readCache() and deserializeFormDef() looks like the same code is duplicated in javarosa org.javarosa.benchmarks.utils.FormDefCache?
timeline.author: grzesiek2010

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is client code. The package you point to is for benchmarks and that code was copied from Collect. You're right that the duplication is weird and I wonder whether we should rework the benchmark a bit on the JR side. I don't think there are changes to make here for now, though.
replies.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Well, I don't know. Maybe some of it should move down to JR. Seems like a consideration for another time, though!
replies.author: lognaturel
